title: Decent Black for Moto 360
summary: Decent Black is a very clean watch face available for all smart watches.
description: Model NumberDW-A01FCategoryDecentProduct description Decent Black is a very clean watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face theme and style accordingly .it has following features> 5 different color watch face > Ambient Mode > Smooth Style Needle> Tick Style NeedleAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu) Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: ✔ Ambient Mode✔ 5 Beautiful Color Themes✔ Smooth & Tick NeedlesConfiguration:  ✔ choose favorite Color✔ switch  between Tick & smooth needle style For Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Decent Black Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A01F

Category
Decent

Product description

Decent Black is a very clean watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face theme and style accordingly .it has following features
> 5 different color watch face
> Ambient Mode
> Smooth Style Needle
> Tick Style Needle
And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
✔ Ambient Mode
✔ 5 Beautiful Color Themes
✔ Smooth & Tick Needles
Configuration:
✔ choose favorite Color
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Decent Black Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: When installed it only gives you black and white. No choice of colours as displayed. But I must say it does look ok
Looks nice But... Looks great but time is off. Installed on LG R but time is out of sync.
Works as expected But not something I personally enjoyed
